<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Program Flow

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Tests a condition and if the condition is false, displays error on screen (if -showscripterrors enabled) and logs error into .rpt file. It does not interrupt the script execution.

If script was pre-processed with [[preprocessFileLineNumbers]], it will also show/log the error line number and the file name.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''assert''' condition

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> condition: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - mirrors condition
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[assert]] (1>2);</code> 

[[Image:PreprocessFile.jpg]]

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> Check function params (Faster alternative to [[BIS_fnc_param]])<code>some_func = {	
	_0 = _this [[select]] 0;
	_1 = _this [[select]] 1;
	_2 = _this [[select]] 2;
	if (![[assert]] (
		[[typeName]] _0 == "ARRAY" && 
		[[typeName]] _1 == "STRING" && 
		[[typeName]] _2 == "SCALAR"
	)) [[exitWith]] {<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>/*</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>optional error logging<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>*/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>};
	[[hint]] "Alright!";
};
[1,2,3] [[call]] some_func; //assert error
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[1],"2",3] [[call]] some_func; //Alright!</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[try]], [[catch]], [[throw]], [[halt]], [[diag_captureFrame]], [[diag_captureSlowFrame]], [[diag_logSlowFrame]]
</value></part></template>
